kihkd7orText:
Perspective on the efficacy and acceptability
of Brintellix®*1
kihkd7oxText:
522 trials, 116,477 patients and 21 antidepressants were analyzed in the acute treatment of adults with
major depressive disorder
Brintellix_26dd9baeba: Head-to-head studies only
Brintellix_26e310d802: 1. Cipriani A et al. Lancet 2018;391:1357-1366.
Brintellix_265d184e9f: Head-to-head studies only
Brintellix_266b708bba:
<font style="font-size: 17.5px; font-family: '3_BNJCUB+AvenirNextLTPro-Regular';color: rgb(100, 94, 94);line-height: 1.3;display:inline-block;">
522 trials, 116,477 patients and 21 antidepressants were analyzed in the acute treatment of adults with major depressive disorder
</font>
Brintellix_26a7892ef5:
* Efficacy was defined by a reduction of ≥50% of the total score on a standarlized observer-rating scale for depression (HAM-D or MADRS).

** Acceptability was defined based on all-cause discontinuation of the treatments.

ORs=odds ratios. 1=agomelatine. 2=amitriptyline. 3=bupropion. 4=citalopram. 5=clomipramine. 7=duloxetine. 8=escitalopram.
9=ﬂuoxetine. 10=ﬂuvoxamine. 12=milnacipran. 13=mirtazapine. 14=nefazodone. 15=paroxetine. 16=reboxetine. 17=sertraline.
18=trazodone. 19=venlafaxine. 21=Brintellix® (vortioxetine). A network meta-analysis of only head-to-head studies included a single
direct study comparison of Brintellix® (vortioxetine) at a dose of 10 mg/day and venlafaxine at a dose of 150 mg/day.

The error bars, indicating 95% credibility intervals, reﬂect limited data for Brintellix® (vortioxetine) in this network meta-analysis.
Brintellix_2671d4ca14:
522 trials, 116,477 patients and 21 antidepressants were analyzed in the acute treatment of adults with major depressive disorder.
* Efficacy was defined by a reduction of ≥50% of the total score on a standarlized observer-rating scale for depression (HAM-D or MADRS); ** Acceptability was defined based on all-cause discontinuation of the treatments. ORs=odds ratios. 1=agomelatine. 2=amitriptyline. 3=bupropion. 4=citalopram. 5=clomipramine. 7=duloxetine. 8=escitalopram. 9=ﬂuoxetine. 10=ﬂuvoxamine. 12=milnacipran. 13=mirtazapine. 14=nefazodone. 15=paroxetine. 16=reboxetine. 17=sertraline. 18=trazodone. 19=venlafaxine. 21=Brintellix® (vortioxetine). A network meta-analysis of only head-to-head studies included a single direct study comparison of Brintellix® (vortioxetine) at a dose of 10 mg/day and venlafaxine at a dose of 150 mg/day. The error bars, indicating 95% credibility intervals, reﬂect limited data for Brintellix® (vortioxetine) in this network meta-analysis.
